tool_description: An API showing all the latest news about Lula  around the world
name: Lula Latest World News
title: Lula Latest World News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about Lula's President from an specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lula-latest-world-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lula-latest-world-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lula-latest-world-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lula-latest-world-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Lula's President Latest World News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Lula's president from all other the world
